name: f1-prediction-game
description: Formula 1 Prediction Challenge - A web-based game where users predict F1 race finishing order and get scored

scripts.check-env:
node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env')) { console.log('
⚠️  No .env file found!
